messages.desc: This folder is known to contain all of your messages sent in servers and DM's

^c+([0-9])*.desc: This folder contains a csv that contains all of your messages sent in the channel determined by the accompanying channel.json

account.desc: This folder contains information relevant to your discord account

account.json.desc: Information about your account in general

activity.desc: This folder contains information about your most recent activity. It seems to me to be your activity of the last six months or so
